text: Balo -- ''tomara ki bhebe dekhecha, allah yadi kere nena tomadera srabanasakti o tomadera drstisakti, ara mohara mere dena tomadera hrdayera upare, tabe allah byatita ke upasya ache ye tomadera aigulo phiriye debe?â€™â€™ Dekho, kirupe amara nirdesasamuha nanabhabe barnana kari, etadasattbe'o tara phire yaya
